a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: The Gini coefficient is a measure of the income distribution of a population. Higher values indicate a higher level of inequality.
Data source: Chartbook of Economic Inequality (2016)
Note: This chart presents Gini coefficient time series that are consistent over time for each country. Before making cross-country comparisons please check the
